name: NowLive
tag_list: social, events, live, entertainment, production, streaming
overview:
NowLive is an entertainment production and streaming company for live events. From red carpet movie premieres, music concerts, and celebrity cast chats to the latest gaming and social media events, NowLive offers live shows for both brands and audiences.

By creating an immersive and social viewing environment, NowLive allows the audience an â€œall-access passâ€ to participate in live events. With built-in multiple camera controls, live chat and real-time interactive quizzes and polls, audiences are engaged, and so are the brands that they are interacting with.

NowLive is also customizable, making it easy for you to remember your favorite events by allowing you to save reminders to iCal, Google Calendar, Outlook or as a Facebook Event RSVP.
